structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.catch_line: Severability of invalid provision or application.
law.text: If any provision of KRS 381.9101 to 381.9207 or the application thereof to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the invalidity shall not affect other provisions or applications of KRS 381.9101 to 381.9207 that can be given effect without the invalid provision or application, and to this end the provisions of KRS 381.9101 to 381.9207 are severable.
law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 97, sec. 11, effective January 1, 2011.
